}} is a J. League Division 1 association football team. The team name Cerezo
means cherry tree in Spanish, which is also the flower of Åsaka city.

The team's home town is Osaka, Japan and plays at Nagai Ball Gall Field, with
some bigger games played at Nagai Stadium. It practices at Minamitsumori Sakura
Sports Park, Maishima Sports Island, and Amagasaki Yanmar Diesel Ground.

A fictional character named Teppei Kisugi from the popular Captain Tsubasa
manga, becomes a professional soccer player and joins Cerezo Osaka.
